wikipedia_page.main: Michael Hugh Tempest Sheringham FBA (1948 – 21 January 2016) was Marshal Foch Professor of French Literature at the University of Oxford from 2004 until his retirement in 2015. He had previously acted a lecturer at University of Kent and University of Ulster

response: * Michael Sheringham, 'Professor Malcolm Bowie' (Obituary), The Guardian 14 Feb 2007
